name: cloudreve
description: Cloudreve is a file sharing and cloud drive system that supports multiple storage backends, user management, and web-based file uploads. It can be used as a lightweight alternative to commercial cloud drives.
features: Cloud Drive: Self-hosted file sharing and storage system. Personal cloud.
Multiple Backends: Support for local, S3, and other storage. Flexible storage.
User Management: Multi-user support with permissions. Shared access.
Web Uploads: Browser-based file upload interface. Easy sharing.
File Sharing: Generate shareable links for files and folders. Controlled sharing.
Commercial Alternative: Lightweight alternative to commercial cloud drives. Cost-effective.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your cloud storage. Data sovereignty.
